content: When you refer a client to Onix, and they make their first payment, we express our gratitude by offering you a 10% referral bonus. This bonus is calculated based on the initial payment received from the referred client.
Our referral program goes beyond financial rewards. It's a gateway to mutual collaboration. By recommending our services, you not only earn rewards but also enhance your professional reputation.
Our referral program lasts 12 months, beginning when Onix receives the first payment from the referred client.
If you have an in-house team but need more experience in a specific technology, refer leads in that area to us. We'll handle the technical aspects while you focus on delivering value to your clients.
Rest assured, your referral bonus will be disbursed promptly after we receive payment from the referred client.
In return, we reciprocate by providing expertise in areas where we excel, but you might be in need. It is a win-win situation where both parties benefit.
